entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 6:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
